title: Raani Pink Kundan Haaram with South Sea Pearls & Emerald Drops
materials: 22K Gold with Antique Finish. Features premium quality Rose-Cut Polki Diamonds
and Emerald beads. Authentic Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: This regal Haaram features a classic Raani haar design with alternating Pink Sapphire and Polki Diamond segments. Each segment is adorned with delicate pearl accents in a 'leaf' motif. The pendant showcases intricate Kundan work with a central Pink Sapphire surrounded by rose-cut Polkis, culminating in a graceful cascade of South Sea Pearls and Emerald drops. Nakshi work detailing is evident on the gold settings, accentuating the traditional aesthetic.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings (పెళ్లి)
description: A timeless masterpiece showcasing the rich heritage of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of Pink Sapphires, Polki Diamonds, and South Sea Pearls creates a luxurious and elegant look. The antique finish adds a touch of vintage charm and enhances the overall grandeur. This Haaram is a valuable heirloom piece, representing both cultural significance and lasting beauty.
